name: 2018 8th International Conference on Environment Science and Engineering (ICESE 2018)--EI Compendex, Scopus
content: 2018 8th International Conference on Environment Science and Engineering (ICESE 2018) will be held in Barcelona, Spain during 11-13 March, 2018.Conference Website: http://www.icese.org/ -- Paper Publishing: All the accepted papers will be published into IOP Conference Series: Earth and Environmental Science (EES) (ISSN: 1755-1315), which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al. -- Submission and Contact Methods Submission Methods: http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icese2018 E-mail: icese@cbees.org Tel: +852-3500-0137 Conference Specialist: Mr. Issac Lee
